synopsis.text: The episode is set during the summer break before the characters begin planning for the school fair. Eager for adventure, the student council girls work odd jobs to raise money for a special camping trip. However, their plans go awry when bad weather strikes. Though disappointed, the friends make the best of the situation by finding shelter at a local hotel. There, they realize that the bonds of friendship can turn any place into an enjoyable getaway. Despite the changed plans, the girls have fun spending quality time together over their summer holiday. Their experiences reinforce their strong relationships while allowing them to recharge before resuming student council responsibilities back at school.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
